CustomField.formula:
IF( (LimitsQueueableJobsUsed__c / LimitsQueueableJobsMax__c * 100) >= 90, "⛔", IF( (LimitsQueueableJobsUsed__c / LimitsQueueableJobsMax__c * 100) < 90 && (LimitsQueueableJobsUsed__c / LimitsQueueableJobsMax__c * 100) >= 80, "⚠️", "✅" ) ) + ' ' +
TEXT(LimitsQueueableJobsUsed__c) + ' / ' + TEXT(LimitsQueueableJobsMax__c) + ' (' + TEXT(ROUND(LimitsQueueableJobsUsed__c / LimitsQueueableJobsMax__c * 100, 2)) + '%)'
CustomField.label: Queueable Jobs
